name: The Ritual (Peck2703)
description:
This game was created by Students and Alumni of Southern New Hampshire University for the BitBridge Halloween Game Jam of 2020. 

The themes for the Game Jam were:

  • Ritual
  • Harvest

We decided to go with a spooky ritual-themed game with horror elements.

Hope you enjoy!
